short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension to watch blunders in your chess games

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blunder Watching is a Chrome extension designed to aid chess players in evaluating their positions on the board. This extension automatically calculates attackers and defenders for each piece, identifies hanging pieces, and assesses whether you can gain material in exchanges.
